topic: How to optimize notebooks to production using fastapi with Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: How to optimize notebooks to production using fastapi with Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Optimizing Notebooks for Production with FastAPI in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide explains how to convert Jupyter notebooks into production-ready applications using FastAPI, a modern, fast (high-performance), web framework for building APIs with Python 3.12+.
key_points: Understanding the differences between Notebooks and Production code
Transforming Jupyter notebooks to FastAPI applications
Implementing best practices for optimization in FastAPI applications
Leveraging Python 3.12+ features for improved performance
version_notes: Python 3.12+ is required for the examples
FastAPI version 0.74.0 or higher is recommended
Additional packages like Uvicorn, Pytest, and Jupyter may be needed
caveats: The guide assumes basic knowledge of Python, FastAPI, and Jupyter notebooks
This is not an exhaustive optimization guide but a starting point for converting notebooks to production-ready applications
